root.name: Klonoa Beach Volleyball
root.description: OverviewKlonoa Beach VolleyballKlonoa Beach Volleyball is a sports game spin-off starring various characters from the Klonoa franchise. The game was only released in Japan and Europe in 2002. The game features characters from Klonoa games on the PlayStation, PlayStation 2, Game Boy Advance and the WonderSwan. The game is considered non-canonical as many of the characters would never meet in the Klonoa franchise. The game is also the first Klonoa release to feature multiplayer with up to four players, allowing them to compete against each other or play cooperatively.
